method: **Pale & Flickering Wisps:** Same as P2P. Grind these quickly south of Draynor or Falador.
tips: Start crafting basic urns if you have the Crafting level.

method: **Guthixian Cache:** MANDATORY for efficient Ironman training. Do not skip.
**Highest Wisp Available:** Always move to the next tier immediately.
tips: Ironmen should prioritize unlocking the **Memorial to Guthix** perks early for free XP.

method: **Hall of Memories:** Still viable for Ironmen, especially if you catch core parties.
tips: Great for AFK if you can't be active for Caches.

method: **Incandescent Energy:** You will need tons of this for charges. Do not convert to XP unless 99 is the only goal.
tips: Prioritize Energy gathering for your Charge Pack.
